movie.title: The Last Days of American Crime
movie.title_english: The Last Days of American Crime
movie.title_long: The Last Days of American Crime (2020)
movie.description_intro: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.
movie.description_full: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

movies.title: Psycho IV: The Beginning
movies.summary: Norman Bates returns for this prequel, once more having mommy trouble. This time around he is invited to share memories of mom with a radio talk show host, but the PSYCHO fears that he may kill again for his beloved is impregnated with his child and Norman cannot let another PSYCHO loose in the civilized world.
movies.description_full: Norman Bates returns for this prequel, once more having mommy trouble. movies.title: Pandas
movies.summary: In the mountains of Sichuan, China, a researcher forms a bond with Qian Qian, a panda who is about to experience nature for the first time.
movies.description_full: In the mountains of Sichuan, China, a researcher forms a bond with Qian Qian, a panda who is about to experience nature for the first time.
movies.synopsis: In the mountains of Sichuan, China, a researcher forms a bond with Qian Qian, a panda who is about to experience nature for the first time.

movies.title: The Circus
movies.summary: The Tramp finds himself at a circus where he is promptly chased around by the police who think he is a pickpocket. Running into the Bigtop, he is an accidental sensation with his hilarious efforts to elude the police. The circus owner immediately hires him, but discovers that the Tramp cannot be funny on purpose, so he takes advantage of the situation by making the Tramp a janitor who just happens to always be in the Bigtop at showtime. Unaware of this exploitation, the Tramp falls for the owner's lovely acrobatic stepdaughter, who is abused by her father. His chances seem good, until a dashing rival comes in and Charlie feels he has to compete with him.

movies.title: Gingerclown
movies.summary: In 1983, a group of high school kids break into an abandoned amusement park only to realize it's overrun with monsters.
movies.description_full: In 1983, a group of high school kids break into an abandoned amusement park only to realize it's overrun with monsters.
